entries.cant_work: You have too many things to do right now. I don't think you have the time to help me.
entries.dontknowyou_1: Go away! I don't need your help.
entries.next: I have no more work for you.
entries.notit_1: No! You did it wrong! Go try again!
entries.notyet: I'm sorry, but you can't help me right now.
entries.npc_1_1: My sister! Where could she be? You! Will you help me? She has been kidnapped by pirates. Please help me, I don't have enough money to pay their ransom. Will you save her for me?
entries.npc_2_1: Thank you, my kind friend. Please hurry. I fear she may be in danger. Let me have your datapad. I can enter the information for you.
entries.npc_3_1: Ahh! Someone help me! This pirate is threatening to hurt me!
entries.npc_4_1: I don't have any other information. Except, you may want to bring your friends with you. Pirates are vile and dangerous.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: At least I still have hope. Please save her as soon as possible.
entries.npc_breech_1: Where is my sister? I must find my sister! You! Will you go find her? She was captured by pirates! They demand that we pay some sort of ransom for her return. Please help me! You can find the pirate hideout here; I've marked it on your map.
entries.npc_failure_1: No! You were suppose to save her! You've failed me.. Please leave.
entries.npc_more_1_1: I have no other information for you except that the hideout can be found in the mountains. Please help me. I'm desperate!
entries.npc_noloc_1: Please come back later. I may have something for you to do.
entries.npc_reward_1: Thank you! You saved my sister. I am ever so grateful!
entries.player_1_1: Yes, I will save her for you.
entries.player_2_1: No, I can't help you. I'm a pirate too!
entries.player_3_1: What other information do you have about these pirates?
entries.player_more_1_1: What other information do you have?
entries.player_reset: I changed my mind. I really don't want to rescue your sister.
entries.player_sorry: The pirates are a bit more difficult than I thought. I plan to try again, though.
entries.waypoint_description_1: A deserted bunker inhabited by vile pirates. Rumors have said that several nobles are held here for ransom.
